events.title: Project Kickoff
events.description: Official start of the rsLSM v1.1 rebuild project. Team meeting to review original design and establish rebuild goals.

events.title: Design Review Complete
events.description: Final CAD design approved by team after comprehensive review of optical path, mechanical assembly, and electronics integration.

events.title: Camera Systems Ordered
events.description: Placed orders for two ORCA-Flash4.0 V3 sCMOS cameras and one KINETIX scientific camera for high-speed whole-brain imaging.

events.title: Laser Sources Ordered
events.description: Ordered OBIS 488nm and 561nm laser systems from Spach Optics for dual-wavelength voltage imaging.

events.title: Hardware Orders Placed
events.description: Bulk order of mechanical hardware, extrusions, and fasteners from McMaster-Carr for structural assembly.

events.title: Optical Table Delivered
events.description: Newport optical table and pneumatic vibration isolation legs arrived. Table installed in lab 2133AB.

events.title: Major Thorlabs Order
events.description: Primary optical components order placed with Thorlabs including galvo scanners, mirrors, lenses, and mounting hardware.

events.title: Camera Systems Received
events.description: All camera systems delivered and tested. Initial functionality verified with test patterns.

events.title: Piezo Systems Ordered
events.description: High-precision piezo focus scanners and controllers ordered from PI for remote scanning capability.

events.title: Lasers Received
events.description: OBIS laser systems delivered. Initial power calibration performed.

events.title: Electronics Order
events.description: DAQ systems, timing controllers, and microcontrollers ordered from DigiKey.

events.title: Custom Parts Ordered
events.description: Custom-fabricated components ordered from Xometry including sample chambers and mounting adapters.

events.title: Thorlabs Components Received
events.description: Major shipment of optical components from Thorlabs arrived. Inventory check and storage completed.

events.title: Galvo System Integration
events.description: Dual-axis galvo scanners mounted and aligned. Initial calibration completed with test patterns.

events.title: Filter Sets Received
events.description: Precision optical filters from IDEX/Semrock arrived. Spectral transmission verified.

events.title: Illumination Path Complete
events.description: Full laser illumination path assembled including beam expanders, galvo scanners, and scan lens. First light sheet generated.

events.title: Piezo Systems Received
events.description: High-precision piezo focus scanners and digital controllers from PI delivered and bench tested.

events.title: Detection Path Assembly Started
events.description: Began assembly of imaging detection path. Objectives mounted and aligned to optical axis.

events.title: Custom Sample Chamber Received
events.description: Custom-fabricated fused silica sample chambers delivered from Xometry. Optical quality verified.

events.title: Lab Meeting Presentation
events.description: Presented rebuild progress at Boyden Lab meeting. Demonstrated first light sheet generation.

events.title: Imaging Path Integration
events.description: Connected detection optics to camera systems. First whole-field images captured.

events.title: Electronics Rack Assembly
events.description: Assembled electronics rack with DAQ systems, power supplies, and control hardware.

events.title: Remote Scanning Calibration
events.description: Calibrated piezo-based remote scanning system. Achieved 400Î¼m axial scan range at 100Hz.

events.title: Control Software Integration
events.description: Integrated LabVIEW-based control software with all hardware systems. Basic automation working.

events.title: First Whole-Brain Images
events.description: Captured first volumetric whole-brain images of zebrafish larvae. System performing to specification.

events.title: Voltage Imaging Tests
events.description: Initial voltage-sensitive dye imaging tests completed. Confirmed neural activity detection capability.

events.title: System Optimization
events.description: Fine-tuned imaging parameters for optimal signal-to-noise. Achieved target 500Hz volumetric rate.

events.title: Build Complete
events.description: rsLSM v1.1 rebuild officially complete. System ready for consciousness imaging experiments.
